title: How did i get ping
body: So over the past year I always play with 20-35 ping and now out of no were I jump from 90-1000 and makes it impossible to play. Nothing has changed so I am confused on what is going on. Please help!

replies.body:
this was my last game today. Yesterday my ping was back to perfect and now today it is back to crap. Nothing has changed so I don't understand what is going on. 
NETWORK DIAGNOSTIC OVERALL RATING: MAJOR ISSUES


Ping Over Time

 0ms500ms1000ms1500ms2000ms2500ms

Your average ping was 262 milliseconds.

The worst ping you experienced was 2114ms. This means you experienced high ping during this game, which is likely where you were seeing issues. See below for a few recommendations to help out with this.
 
Packet Loss Over Time

 0%10%20%30%40%

Your average percentage of packet loss for this game was 13.90%.

Overall, this means you had a high amount of packets lost during the game. This can be caused by various network issues, so please see below for a few common steps that can help reduce packet loss.

What's likely going on is that there may be issues along your ISP's network infrastructure or a company they partner with to get your connection to our servers. I strongly suggest you first ensure your network settings are good by working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). If you continue to have issues afterwards, please let me know so we can look at your routing.

Someone said something about pocket loss don't know what that is but I ran a test maybe someone else would be able to let me know 
http://www.pingtest.net/result/154287769.png
